title: Software Engineer (Remote)
description: Outlier is looking for skilled software engineers to help train AI models by evaluating and improving AI-generated code. You’ll work on a freelance basis with flexible hours and weekly payments.
requirements: Proficiency in at least two programming languages: JavaScript, Python, Go, Java, TypeScript, or C++
Professional experience maintaining production-grade software
Strong knowledge of Git (or similar version control systems)
Experience with code reviews, debugging, and analyzing large codebases
Strong attention to detail and ability to communicate technical feedback clearly
English proficiency required

title: Customer Care Executive
location: Bangalore , Chennai , Gurgaon , Hyderabad , Kochi , Mumbai , Navi Mumbai , Noida , Pune
description: Wipro is hiring for the role of Customer Care Executive!
requirements: Minimum educational qualification: 12th pass.
Age between 18 to 30 years.
Strong verbal and written communication skills in English and one regional language (Hindi, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, or Kannada).
Ability to empathize with customers and resolve queries efficiently.
Prior experience in customer service or sales will be advantageous.
Proficiency in Excel and basic computer skills preferred.

title: Digital Marketing Associate
description: Create intuitive and beautiful user experiences for our web and mobile applications. Collaborate with developers and product managers to bring designs to life.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field.
2+ years of experience in digital marketing.
Strong understanding of digital marketing principles and best practices.
Proficiency in social media marketing, email marketing, and SEO.
Experience with analytics tools, such as Google Analytics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Passion for digital marketing and a desire to stay up-to-date on the latest trends.

title: .Net MVC Developers
description: Unnati Informatics LLP is hiring for the role of .Net MVC Developers!
requirements: 1.5+ years of hands-on experience in ASP.NET MVC 4+ development.
Strong proficiency in C#, .NET Framework, Entity Framework, and LINQ.
Experience working with SQL Server (T-SQL, Stored Procedures, Functions, Triggers, etc.).
Solid understanding of OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) and Design Patterns.
Proficiency in JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, and Bootstrap for frontend integration.
Experience with RESTful API development and integration.
Familiarity with Version Control Systems (e.g., Git, TFS).
Knowledge of dependency injection frameworks (e.g., Autofac, Ninject) is a plus.
Ability to write clean, scalable, and efficient code.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

title: Customer Service Representative
description: Etech Global Services is hiring for the role of Customer Service Representative!
requirements: High secondary or 10+2 diploma with 3 years of experience in a related field; OR
Any stream graduate degree with 1 year of experience.
Strong computer skills, especially proficiency in Microsoft Office, Outlook, and other internet-based tools.
Strong understanding of business operations, including spreadsheet management, data analysis, and identifying trends.

title: Finance Executive
description: Prepare and maintain accounting entries, manage accounts payable and accounts receivable processes, financial reports, including balance sheets, profit and loss statements, and cash flow statements.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
Proven experience in accounting or finance role.
Experience with Chartered Accountant (preferred).
Strong knowledge of accounting principles and practices.
Proficiency in accounting software, Tally and MS Office, particularly Excel.
Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

title: Senior Engineer
description: Advent Global is hiring for the role of Senior Engineer!
requirements: Has a Microsoft certification relevant to developers who focus on Power Platform and Power Apps development and/or architecture
Basic knowledge and experience of using Azure DevOps
Experience working in a Scrum team environment

title: Graphic Designer
description: We're on the lookout for a talented Graphic Designer who can bring product ideas to life with high-quality mockups, illustrations, and 3D-style visualizations. If you're a pro at Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator, and love designing digital assets.
requirements: Strong command of Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator
Proven experience in mockup design, illustration, and product visualization
A creative portfolio showcasing your best design work (mockups, product design, etc.)
Basic understanding of 3D rendering tools (optional but a big plus!)

title: Senior Sales Executive
description: In addition to an outstanding work environment with rapid advancement potential, you get the opportunity to work with a super talented team of professionals from high pedigree backgrounds like ISB, BITS Pilani, NIT s etc.
requirements: Demonstrated experience of driving top results in B2C Sales.
Excellent communication skills and strong mastery over written and verbal English
Strong phone presence and experience in closing sales over the phone.
Highly self motivated able to work with target driven mindset
Minimum 1+ years experience in similar roles in education and related industries.

title: Network Engineer
description: Design, deploy, and maintain cutting-edge network infrastructure. Troubleshoot, optimize, and ensure network security while focusing on quality checks.
requirements: BE/BTech degree in Electronics & Communication, Computer Science, Information Technology, or Electrical & Electronics (recognized by AICTE/UGC/Ministry of HRD).
Minimum 1 year of relevant post-qualification experience in IT/Telecommunication Systems/Optical Fibres for degree holders.
For Diploma holders (recognized by AICTE/UGC/Ministry of HRD), a minimum of 6 years of post-qualification experience in the relevant field is required.

title: PHP Developer
description: This opportunity has been listed by Codeft Digital.
requirements: Expertise in PHP, MySQL, and related web technologies.
Strong experience in debugging, performance optimisation, and scalability.
Familiarity with resource-intensive application architectures.
Hands-on experience with Laravel and CodeIgniter frameworks.
Ability to identify potential bottlenecks and provide innovative solutions.
Adaptability to balance support and development tasks effectively.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in teams.
Exceptional problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

title: Human Resource Executive
description: This opportunity has been listed by Panacorp Software Solution.
requirements: Strong communication and leadership skills.
Experience in HR processes (recruitment, payroll, compliance).
Problem-solving and conflict-resolution abilities.
Knowledge of labor laws and HR best practices.
Proficient in HR software (e.g., HRMS, payroll tools).
